main event: A witness observed a luminous object in the sky near Cleveland, Ohio, on December 27, 1954.
interesting points: The object was observed for only 1 minute and 20 seconds., The sky was clear at the time of observation., The witness described the object as luminescent white to yellow and about the size of a small aircraft., The object appeared to disappear and reappear gradually., The witness noted that there were 5 or 6 similar objects observed moving rapidly and erratically on December 8, 1964.
sighted object: a small round or pear-shaped luminous object
